text:
running 1.3.22 I saw this in my error_log

[Wed Jul 10 15:15:35 2002] [warn] Apache does not support line-end comments.
Consider using quotes around argument: "# CrossOver"

There was no string "# CrossOver" in my config file.  Eventually I found
it was in /etc/mime.types.  The error message really should indicate in
which file the syntax error was found.
creator: apachebugs@carls.mm.st
